Description Wafer Bonder
Wafer Size Range

Other Information

Designed to wax mount GaAs wafers on sapphire or glass substrates
Configured for twelve 4" waffers
Plattens for different size wafers available from Sharon Vacuum
Heat: 80-150 Deg. C Max
Vacuum pump not included
